body_content.explanation: a method of dyeing hair or cloth (= changing its colour with a special liquid) in which only part of the hair or cloth is covered with or put into the liquid :
examples: Dip dye is a classic two-tone colouring technique, where the hair is dark at the roots with light ends.
There are a lot of clashing prints, layering up of beautiful, muted tones and patterns such as dip-dye and tie-dye.

body_content.explanation: to dye hair or cloth (= change its colour with a special liquid) using a method in which only part of the hair or cloth is covered with or put into the liquid :
examples: I'm a redhead and am trying to decide what colour to dip dye my hair.
We offer a wide selection of quality dip-dyed wigs, ponytails, and hair extensions for women.
